My version of VLC (0.8.6h) plays it just fine, and to my knowledge no one has installed anything close to the CCCP codec on this machine.
Thanks for the upload, but I just cannot for the life of me get the Kanji english subs to work. I've tried many different programs and filters, but it just does not work for me.

to view this the best quality possible use CCCP(cccp-project.net/) with its internal codecs or if you have a slower PC use coreAVC from piratebay to use your graphics card(needs an nvidia 8 series or better) netbook loves it(ion based).
